content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #220

## May 2019 Ballot Comment:

Submitted by Anthony Julian
Chapter/section: Sources of risk
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/security-considerations/
Type: NEG :exclamation: Clarification
In Person requested: Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Summary:

Comment: Does this mean PHI?

Existing wording: The FHIRcast Hub pushes PII to a dynamic url specified by the authenticated app.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

isaacvetter commented on Issue #220

Hey Tony, this is not normative-track content and not technically what is being balloted.
I'm not sure why we described this as Personally Identifiable Information (PII). I agree with you that it should be PHI.

I'll update.

NiklasSvenzen labeled Issue #220

wmaethner commented on Issue #220

## Montreal May 2019 Working Group Vote

Niklas Svenzen moved the following disposition, seconded by Chris Carr

Disposition: Not related
Disposition Comment: Will update to PHI and define what PHI is as well.

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
